title: Axtools CodeSMART 2009 for VB6
description:
Hey vb lovers ! ...
This is an IDE enhancer for VB6 ... i personally love it.... cus... srsly... it's the best in it's stuff.... and the only crack available for it was for version 2005 or something.... The new one's really awesome... so here's the compilation of the program and the patcher i made....


and a lil' description pulled from the website:
 <a href="
http://www.aivosto.com/codesmart/vb6.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.aivosto.com/codesmart/vb6.html</a>
 <a href="
http://www.axtools.com/products/showcs2k3vb/Integration.gif" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.axtools.com/products/showcs2k3vb/Integration.gif</a>


1. Integration
* General Integration Notes
* Tabbed Documents Support
2. VB Code Window Enhancements
* Branch Lines
* End of Line Details
* Hotspot Markers
* Current Line Highlighting
* Right Hand Separator
3. Explorer Tools
* The Project Explorer
* The Code Flow Explorer
* The Designer Explorer
* The Library Explorer
4. Locate Code Easier than Ever
* Extended Find and Replace
* Find References
5. Check and Refine Your Projects
* Code Analyzer
* Designer Analyzer
* Spelling Checker
* Strings Review
* Code Commenting Conformity Checker



6. Write Code with Exceptional Efficiency
* AutoText
* SmartComplete
* Code Builders
* The Extended Clipboard
7. Save Time with Designer Tools
* Tab Order Designer
* Hotkey Designer
* Change Name and Text Properties
* New Control Properties
* Bulk Controls Renamer
* UI Standard Properties Manager
8. Reformat and Document Your Code
* Code Formatter
* Sort Procedures
* Commenting Tools
9. Protect From Errors and Exceptions
* Error Handling Schemes
* Tracing
* Handling Exceptions
10. Other Tools
* AutoSave and AutoBackup
* Code Statistics
* Custom Code Inserter
* Show File Differences
* Task List Manager

CodeSMART 2009 for VB6 is exceptionally well integrated within the Visual Basic 5.0 and 6.0 IDEs. All the features it adds to Visual Basic are accessible through the main menu (1) and four toolbars (2) it registers with the environment. CodeSMART tools are hosted or display their results within dedicated tool windows (3, and 4) that can be moved or docked. Code view enhancements are displayed directly in the Visual Basic standard code editor window (5). There are many more proofs of the excellent integration CodeSMART has with Visual Basic, like the MDI tabs it adds to the IDE, the tabs added to the Immediate window (which is thus converted into a central reporting place while it does not loose its initial functionality) - these on the visual part, because there is a hidden part too, where everything is magically inserted into Visual Basic's processing chain.
